message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "Using data from the World Bank Enterprise Survey and Global Financial Development Database, we analyze the impact of financial constraints on firm performance in low-income countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Survey", "Global Financial Development Database"], "topic": ["Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "Our study leverages data from the Mexico National Census of Population and Housing and household surveys to examine the effects of migration on the well-being of family members left behind.", "dataset": ["Mexico National Census of Population and Housing", "household surveys"], "topic": ["Migration"]}, {"sentence": "We used panel data from the 2010-19 period in 10 countries across Latin America and the Caribbean to estimate the impact of conditional cash transfer programs on poverty reduction.", "dataset": ["panel data from the 2010-19 period in 10 countries"], "topic": ["Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "This analysis draws on two datasets: the DHS and Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey (MICS) to investigate trends and differentials in contraceptive use among women of reproductive age in sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["DHS", "Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey (MICS)"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "Using district-level data on school infrastructure quality and child health outcomes from multiple rounds of the India Human Development Survey, we find positive effects of improved school infrastructure on child health.", "dataset": ["India Human Development Survey"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "We combine high-resolution land cover maps with climate, soil, and conservation data to assess the potential for community-based forest management as a strategy for biodiversity conservation in the tropics.", "dataset": ["high-resolution land cover maps"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Employing two complementary data sources, namely administrative records and survey data, we analyze the relationship between public transport connectivity and unemployment in urban areas of Europe.", "dataset": ["administrative records", "survey data"], "topic": ["Transport"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the links between air pollution and cardiovascular disease using data from both a national health survey dataset and an air quality monitoring dataset, both from China.", "dataset": ["national health survey dataset", "air quality monitoring dataset"], "topic": ["Health", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We use a unique dataset on informal traders in Accra, Ghana that combines geospatial mapping and survey data to analyze factors affecting their choice of location and daily earnings.", "dataset": ["unique dataset on informal traders in Accra"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture platform, we investigate the factors causing low agricultural productivity in Malawi and suggest strategies for enhancing food security.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture platform"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}]
